Entries.BoatTunnel_boatcomplete: All materials have been found.#The boat will be repaired overnight.
Entries.BoatTunnel_willyText_random0: The smell is a bit much for most folk.

Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11477: Plenty of fishing supplies left here.
Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11478: Hold your breath; I've been told the smell here is putrid.

Entries.willyBackRoomInvitation: @,^^I have unlocked the back room of the fishing shop.^Come by when you have a chance.^There's something I want to show you.^^-M. Rasmodius[#]Magnus' Back Room Invitation
Entries.willyHours: I have excellent news, @.^^Willy's boat is seaworthy once again, thanks to you.^^Stop by the back room whenever you want a ride.^^The shop is now open at 8AM every day, so you can get an early start.^^-M. Rasmodius[#]Willy's Boat

Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh_Willy: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by the fish shop the other day and bought {1} {2}. I've never seen one so fresh! #$b#So I cooked it up for dinner last night, and it filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!$h#$b#Magnus told me you caught it yourself... I'm impressed!#$e# Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityLow_Willy: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by the fish shop the other day and bought {1} {2}. Magnus said you caught it yourself! #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... and, uh... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where you found that thing...$s#$e#Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Willy: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. I'm impressed.
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Jodi_Willy: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. Very firm meat.
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityLow_Willy: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It smelled kind of fishy, but it was alright.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude_Willy: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on a 'chum-bucket' sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was {4}! No wonder Magnus was practically giving that {5} away...
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityHigh_Rude_Willy: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only{3}g.#$e# It was actually pretty {4}.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_NonRude_Willy: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# I couldn't pass up that great price.
Entries.PurchasedItem_4_Willy: So I was at the fish shop other day and Magnus showed me {1} {2} you brought in.#$e#I cooked it up for dinner with some lemon and a side of rice pilaf. Pretty good!$h
Entries.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityLow_Willy: Ahoy... you know that {2} you sold me the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...#$b#T'was the mealiest fish I've ever set me gums on...$s
Entries.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityHigh_Willy: Ahoy! Remember that {2} you brought in the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...#$b#T'was the finest fish I've had since I was a wee lad!$h
Entries.Island_willy_rescue: Yes... you appear stable... hmm?#$b#Oh, you're awake. I found you washed up on the shore.$s#$b#Take care, evergreen one. This island can be a most dangerous place.
